script_segments.image_prompt: Close-up of a cute Pomeranian dog named Ttang-kong with tan and cream fluffy fur, wearing a gray knitted scarf and a yellow leash. Ttang-kong is looking up with big, pleading brown eyes. The background is slightly blurred, showing a living room. He looks directly at the camera with an adorable, hungry expression.

scene_details.background: Cozy living room with a sofa and coffee table

script_segments.image_prompt: A middle-aged East Asian woman with a round face and warm smile, wearing a maroon dress with 3/4 sleeves and pearl details, and a thin silver necklace, looking down at Ttang-kong with a loving expression. She is kneeling slightly, holding her hands out towards the dog. The living room background is visible, slightly out of focus.
